english.segment1: VS 1: Reflecting back on when I met you. I was so lost. In this crazy world. Like a father to his child. Lord you saved me. Gave me wings of love. To soar so free
english.segment2: You are the air I breathe. You are my everything. You are my only hope. The wind beneath my wings
english.segment3: CHORUS: And I never knew what love was. Until I met you. I never felt peace before. Until you touched me. I didn't know how to breathe. Until you showed me. You are my everything, everything, everything, yeah
english.segment4: VS 2: Beside you Lord. There is no other. Creator of the universe. And you loved me so. You gave your only son. The only way, the only truth, the one
english.segment5: You are the air I breathe. You are my everything. You are my only hope. The reason why I sing
